message.body: Hey!!! It was nice! Back for tonight but we are heading to asheville tmw to look at land!
Oh man you are back already?? I thought you were staying so much longer. Glad you had a nice time! :)
I was going to but hunter wants to buy like 14 acres in North Carolina so I came home today so I could see it
Are you guys seriously looking for land in Asheville? Like for serious? If you move there I'm moving there.
We are just gonna go look. I'm gonna keep him from Making any rushed decisions
Ok, but if you guys buy land make sure there is enough space for a mother in law sweet...me being your mother in law in this case.
Haha. Oh there's room. There's a house, a yurt, a massage "deck" where you can work, hexadomes, a bath house.
Sounds perfect for me.
Haha
What are you guys gonna do this weekend?
It's windy out!
Woah! Where'd that storm come from??
We don't really have any plans yet...right now I'm just drinking an orangina and vodka in my pjs...real casual.
That sounds nice. I'm also having some vodka with cran in my pjs. I just found out today my script got through the first round for Sundance writers lab. Celebration!
Woah!!!! That's amazing! So exciting!!
Let's go to cantina to celebrate when you get back!!
Oh, ella bday this Saturday! Almost forgot
Yeah!!! Please let's! Shit I'm gonna miss it!
You have to tell her happy b day from me!
I will! :)
You guys have a great trip! KIT when you're back!
I will! We should be back Tuesday night. Gonna be a crazy few days! I'll text you when we get back!
